actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-485.
Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 93-864.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the report of the proceedings of the forty-sixth biennial meeting of the Convention of American Instructors of the Deaf as a Senate document.

summary.text: Provides that the report of the proceedings of the forty-sixth biennial meeting of the Convention of American Instructors of the Deaf, held in Indianapolis, Indiana, from June 24, 1973, through June 29, 1973, be printed with illustrations as a Senate document. Provides that five thousand five hundred additional copies of such document shall be printed for the use of the Joint Committee on Printing.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the printing of the report of the proceedings of the forty-sixth biennial meeting of the Convention of American Instructors of the Deaf as a Senate document.
